title: The.Wolverine.2013.HardSubbed.RHeat.mp4
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1430132/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1430132/</a>

Storyline: In modern day Japan, Wolverine is out of his depth in an unknown world as he faces his ultimate nemesis in a life-or-death battle that will leave him forever changed. Vulnerable for the first time and pushed to his physical and emotional limits, he confronts not only lethal samurai steel but also his inner struggle against his own immortality, emerging more powerful than we have ever seen him before.

Genres: Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi

Director: James Mangold
Writers: Mark Bomback (screenplay), Scott Frank (screenplay)
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto

Country: Australia | USA
Language: English | Japanese
Release Date: 26 July 2013 (USA)

Note: I used online source for subtitles for both English and Japanese and I cleaned them up as much as I could (many typos or misspellings) and I integrated them (hard subs) into the movie to make it one file.

Enjoy!
